lead_paragraph: How much food does your family waste?
snippet: A quarter to half of all food produced in the United States goes uneaten, a lot of it scraped into the garbage or forgotten until it spoils.

headline.main: From Farm to Fridge to Garbage Can

abstract: A quarter to half of all food produced in the United States goes uneaten, a lot of it scraped into the garbage or forgotten until it spoils.
